short_description: wasp power & filtration solutions is an industrial air solutions company based in st. albans, united kingdom.
long_description: wasp are critical power solutions providers. wasp power and filtration solutions is part of the wasp technologies group. offering services such as fuel filtration, low and medium voltage switchgear, heating and cooling system side stream filtration units, oem filter supplies (fuel, air, oil, water, hydraulic), filter sourcing, and more. our head office is in hertfordshire, uk, but we have offices in the usa, mexico and poland, with a distributor network covering the entire globe. we design and build equipment for use in data centres, healthcare, factors, shopping centres, amusement parks, transport hubs, telecoms companies, agriculture, power generation and facilities management. we are committed to environmental thinking partnership working and technology-driven advances,let's work together.
